id.description: The unique identifier for the smart collection

handle.description: The human-friendly URL for the collection

title.description: The title or name of the smart collection

updated_at.description: The date and time when the collection was last updated

body_html.description: The description or details of the smart collection

published_at.description: The date and time when the collection was published

sort_order.description: The order in which the collection is displayed

template_suffix.description: The suffix added to the collection template filename

disjunctive.description: Indicates whether the collection uses disjunctive filtering

rules.description: The filtering rules that determine which products are included in the collection

published_scope.description: The visibility of the collection to different sales channels

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the collection in the GraphQL Admin API

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop where the smart collection belongs
